items.sentence: Most of us still wish that Tom would do that.
Is there anything that you didn't understand?
Nobody seemed to notice that Tom was missing.
Tom is afraid of what his friends will think.
Tom said that he wouldn't sleep on the floor.
Don't eat all the grapes. Leave some for Tom.
Do you want me to find you something to read?
You don't see something like this very often.
Tom was very worried about his wife's health.
Tom was looking forward to seeing his family.
We're eventually going to be able to do that.
You never appreciate the things I do for you.
I think the eggs that I just ate were rotten.
I have an appointment with my uncle tomorrow.
Your success is the result of your hard work.
I'm surprised that it hasn't happened sooner.
Tom will start studying French next semester.
Nothing but a full apology would satisfy Tom.
The citizens uprose against the dictatorship.
Tom is the only one here planning to do that.
